## Checklist

- [ ] Tests pass: `composer test`
- [ ] No PHPCS violations: `composer phpcs`
- [ ] `CHANGELOG.md` updated under `## [Unreleased]`
- [ ] Documentation updated (`README.md`, `readme.txt`, `docs/`) if behavior changed
- [ ] New hooks/filters have PHPDoc and are listed in `docs/ARCHITECTURE.md`
- [ ] No `TODO` or `FIXME` left in source
- [ ] Commit messages are clear and descriptive
- [ ] No `final` modifier on classes that need to be mocked in tests
